scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && npm run lint && tsc --project src/tsconfig.json
scripts.doc: npm run build && npm run api-extractor && npm run crlf
scripts.mocha: rm -rf test/database* && npx cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.mocha.json mocha
scripts.mocha-noretry: rm -rf test/database* && npx cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.mocha.json mocha --retries 0
scripts.test: npx nyc npm run mocha "test/**/*.test.ts" "test_intg/**/*.test.ts" && rm -rf test/database*
scripts.test-noretry: npx nyc npm run mocha-noretry "test/**/*.test.ts" "test_intg/**/*.test.ts" && rm -rf test/database*
scripts.test-serial: npx nyc npm run mocha -- --no-parallel  "test/**/*.test.ts" "test_intg/**/*.test.ts" && rm -rf test/database*
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.api-extractor: npx api-extractor run --local --verbose && npx api-documenter markdown -i ./temp -o ./docs
